coding_practice.title: Longest Common Prefix
coding_practice.description:
Write a function to find the longest common prefix string amongst an array of strings.

If there is no common prefix, return an empty string "".

examples.explanation: There is no common prefix among the input strings.

coding_practice.constraints:
1 <= strs.length <= 200
0 <= strs[i].length <= 200
strs[i] consists of only lowercase English letters if it is non-empty.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 如果輸入列表為空，返回空字串。
2. 以第一個字串作為初始前綴。
3. 遍歷其餘字串，若當前字串不以前綴開頭，逐步縮短前綴直到匹配。
4. 若前綴變成空，則表示無公共前綴。
5. 返回最終匹配的前綴。
